programme.desc: Everyone loves carbs! Endlessly versatile, cheap, and super filling - Frankie shows you tricks for pasta, pizza dough, and delicious, easy ramen meals that arent soup.

programme.title: Cauliflowers Star Power
programme.desc: Cauliflower is a star and can be transformed into unexpected dishes. Plus its delicious and nutritious! Frankie reminds us to buy dried-goods in bulk and makes a big chuck roast that stretches over three dishes.

programme.title: Food Back from the Dead
programme.desc: Stale bread, old bananas, canned food, dry foods... theyve all gotten a bad wrap, but this is not the end of them yet! Dont let this stuff sit in the pantry, dont let it go to waste - Frankie encourages you to stretch further and cheaper!

programme.title: Party for Pennies
programme.desc: Frankie makes three dishes for a party of four, that when combined, are cheaper than just one meal out for brunch. Then, its a taco party for five people for only $20!

programme.title: Instant Gratification
programme.desc: Everyone loves carbs! Endlessly versatile, cheap, and super filling - Frankie shows you tricks for pasta, pizza dough, and delicious, easy ramen meals that arent soup.

programme.title: We Knead Pizza
programme.desc: Cancel the pizza delivery, its time to save money and build your pies from scratch. With three different pizza styles, youre bound to find one that satisfies your craving without digging into your wallet.

programme.title: Oktoberfest
programme.desc: Join Frankie as he shares his budget friendly takes on Oktoberfest-inspired dishes, perfect for celebrating the fall season with friends. These festive and hearty meals will keep you cozy and full, and best of all, pair nicely with a beer.

programme.title: Cauliflowers Star Power
programme.desc: Cauliflower is a star and can be transformed into unexpected dishes. Plus its delicious and nutritious! Frankie reminds us to buy dried-goods in bulk and makes a big chuck roast that stretches over three dishes.

programme.title: Food Back from the Dead
programme.desc: Stale bread, old bananas, canned food, dry foods... theyve all gotten a bad wrap, but this is not the end of them yet! Dont let this stuff sit in the pantry, dont let it go to waste - Frankie encourages you to stretch further and cheaper!

programme.title: Party for Pennies
programme.desc: Frankie makes three dishes for a party of four, that when combined, are cheaper than just one meal out for brunch. Then, its a taco party for five people for only $20!

programme.title: Instant Gratification
programme.desc: Everyone loves carbs! Endlessly versatile, cheap, and super filling - Frankie shows you tricks for pasta, pizza dough, and delicious, easy ramen meals that arent soup.

programme.title: Farm Forward Cooking
programme.desc: From a chef creating dishes that combine her Mexican and Indigenous heritage to a pizza pop up that improvs with farmers market ingredients to a backyard-run Indigenous dinner series, Stephanie Izard meets cooks taking their lead from the land.

programme.title: Origins to Originals
programme.desc: From roast chicken to smash burgers to hot sauce, Stephanie Izard meets three different chefs putting their own California-inspired spin on food from their heritage by remixing traditional recipes that center local, fresh ingredients.

programme.title: Unique Eats
programme.desc: From a chef making Italian pasta with Mexican flavors to a groundbreaking functional cocktail bar to a couple that roasts whole goats behind a tire shop, Stephanie Izard finds unique eateries serving up one-of-a-kind food.

programme.title: Family Style
programme.desc: From brothers selling moms Syrian food to a Filipino family remixing a classic dessert to a mom and son running an Indian restaurant out of their house, Stephanie meets multi-gen families turning family recipes into smash hit food business.

programme.title: Pierogies, Bagels, and Ramen in NYC
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza takes a LOT of bites out of the big apple as he samples warm pillowy bagels And schmear, grabs pierogies at an old school Ukrainian spot, gets the scoop on innovative ice cream flavors, and slurps up some real ramen.

programme.title: Tacos, Brats, And Biscuits in Austin
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza goes down south to try Austins best bets - breakfast tacos are on the itinerary, as well as a bangin beer garden And sausage house, loaded biscuits, and dessert pancakes to boot! Austin may be weird but the food is fabulous.

programme.title: Smash Burgers And A Slice in Los Angeles
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza heads to all the buzzworthy spots in LA - cooking up calamari steak at a classic Mexican joint, tasting taro root donuts with fun flavors, grabbing a guanciale slice, and hopping on the line to make cheesy scrumptious smash burgers.

programme.title: Brooklyns Best Pizza Tour
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza goes on the best pizza party crawl that Brooklyn has to offer. Hell try a Neo-Neapolitan pie, a classic coal oven favorite, hell hit up a modern joint with innovative toppings, and a cozy Italian-owned neighborhood spot.

programme.title: BBQ Bowls And Puffy Tacos in San Antonio
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza gets his spurs on to sample San Antonios best all-day brunch, taste some epic puffy tacos at a classic car joint, create colorful conchitas, and bask in the beauty of BBQ Thai curry bowls.

programme.title: Loaded Dogs And Classic Cocktails in San Diego
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza heads to San Diego to sample a modern spin on classic deli fare, heavily loaded low-riding hot dogs, frosty And fruity Taiwanese snow ice, and fancy French cocktails from a rotating carousel bar.

programme.title: Lunches for Work
programme.desc: A big way to save money is to prepare homemade lunches for work. Frankie shows us how to make five delicious lunches for the whole work week. Youll be saving money, and you might even be more productive at work after a nutritious homemade lunch!

programme.title: The Weekly Struggle Budget
programme.desc: Frankie figured out the weekly budget grocery equation so you dont have to. Breakfast, lunch, and dinner for seven days, for a family of four, for under $150. All it takes is a little planning, meal prep, and using up leftovers in inventive ways.

programme.title: An Eggplant Extravaganza
programme.desc: Eggplant: A fruit you didnt know was a fruit. Often underrated and overlooked, Frankie shows us how to shop for and cook this filling, delicious, cost-effective, and versatile ingredient. The days of mushy, bitter eggplant will be long gone.

programme.desc: Ferit, seorang jejaka dari keluarga kaya yang dihancurkan oleh pengkhianatan orang yang dipercayainya. Dalam usaha melupakan masa lalu, dia bertemu dengan Aye, seorang gadis yang ceria dan penuh semangat.

programme.title: Ray of Light
programme.desc: Mengisahkan seorang guru yang kembali mengajar di Sekolah Tinggi Qing Yun setelah perniagaan yang diusahakannya gagal. Di sana, beliau bertemu dengan seorang pelajar bernama Ren Zhen.

programme.title: Berita Mandarin
programme.desc: Ikuti berita berbahasa Mandarin yang memaparkan perkembangan politik, sosial, ekonomi, sukan, hiburan dan isu-isu semasa.

programme.title: Berita Tamil
programme.desc: Berita berbahasa Tamil yang memaparkan perkembangan politik, sosial, ekonomi, sukan, hiburan dan isu-isu semasa.

programme.title: Perfume
programme.desc: Mengisahkan seorang suri rumah pertengahan umur, Min Jae-hee, yang hidupnya musnah akibat kecurangan suami dan tekanan hidup yang menghancurkan keyakinan dirinya.

programme.title: Banyak Canteq
programme.desc: Selepas kecewa perniagaan butik batiknya kurang menjadi di Kelantan, Daddy Ngah dan Mommy Ngah berhijrah dan membuka perniagaan di Kuala Lumpur. Mereka di bantu anak saudaranya Nuri untuk menguruskan butik

programme.title: King of Mask Singer
programme.desc: Pertandingan nyanyian yang unik dan mendebarkan. Peserta harus menyembunyikan identiti yang boleh dikenal pasti dan hanya bakat nyanyian sahaja yang menyerlah!

programme.title: The Blacklist
programme.desc: Pasukan FBI dalam operasi untuk menyelamatkan seorang ejen CIA yang sedang dalam misi penyamaran yang telah diculik oleh pasukan pemisah di Uzbekistan.

programme.title: OBB (Orang Baik-Baik)
programme.desc: Majalah yang memaparkan kehidupan dan aktiviti seseorang atau sekumpulan warga yang layak diiktiraf sebagai OBB iaitu Orang Baik-Baik berlandaskan aktiviti kemasyarakatan atau kebajikan yang diusahakan.

programme.title: Noktah Dendam
programme.desc: Kisah dua buah keluarga iaitu Mahadi di Malaysia dan Richard di Indonesia. Atas sebab urusan perniagaan, jalinan cinta dan dendam pemuda bernama David telah mencantumkan cerita dua keluarga ini.

programme.title: Aku Cinta Aku Rindu
programme.desc: Drama kemasyarakatan yang memaparkan hubungan kekeluargaan, persahabatan dan percintaan.

programme.title: Jeyam
programme.desc: Drama kemasyarakatan yang memaparkan hubungan kekeluargaan, persahabatan dan percintaan.

programme.title: Grahanam
programme.desc: Kisah seorang suami yang mengalami sakit mental akibat perasaan cemburu yang melampau terhadap isterinya hingga membawa kepada perlakuan jenayah.

programme.title: Hope of Life
programme.desc: Kisah kehidupan 3 pakar bedah yang berbeza status dan latar belakang, namun mereka komited dengan kerjaya mereka sebagai doktor.

programme.title: Thanks for Having You
programme.desc: Hui Mei masih tidak dapat menerima kenyataan ibunya telah meninggal dunia akibat terjatuh di dapur. Dia sentiasa berasa dirinya bersalah kerana menyelesaikan tugasnya sebelum pulang ke rumah.

programme.title: Sanggar Cinta Raudhah
programme.desc: Kisah ketabahan Raudhah yang menjalani kehidupan selepas kematian suami selain terpaksa memikul tanggungjawab menguruskan syarikat peninggalan arwah suaminya.

programme.title: CJ the DJ
programme.desc: Animasi yang mengisahkan CJ, seorang remaja yang gemarkan muzik.

programme.title: Tulis
programme.desc: Animasi bersiri yang membawa cerita kanak-kanak yang dapat memberi pengajaran dengan penggunaan watak-watak alat tulis seperti pensil, pembaris, pen, stapler dan sebagainya.

programme.title: Pendekar Lima
programme.desc: Animasi yang mengisahkan 5 remaja dari lima 5 bangsa di Malaysia yang memiliki kebolehan seni pertahanan diri berbeza.

programme.desc: Seoul has laid in ruin after an earthquake, leaving one single apartment remains standing. The apartments resident representative strives to protect residents from outsiders...

programme.title: The Magician
programme.desc: A talented young magician falls for a princess betrothed to his former teacher, leading to a fierce showdown between the two powerful magicians.

programme.title: Ordinary People
programme.desc: When a high school gym teacher helps his student track down her missing friend, he finds himself faced with a conspiracy related to her disappearance.

programme.title: A Millionaires First Love
programme.desc: To inherit his grandfathers fortune, Jae-kyung has to transfer to a school in the countryside. He fell in love with a pretty girl Eun-hwan and is going to know about her secrets...

programme.title: Confession
programme.desc: A man who became a suspect in a closed-door murder seeks help from an attorney to prove him innocent. As they begin to piece the puzzle together, the truth slowly reverses.

programme.title: Peninsula
programme.desc: Set four years after the zombie outbreak, a former soldier and his team return to the zombie-infested wastelands to retrieve a truck of money and try to escape from it alive.

programme.title: Sisters on the Road
programme.desc: After her mothers death, Myung-eun meets her sister Myung-ju. They do not share the same father and decided to travel together to find Myung-euns father. A secret of her father reveals...

programme.title: Juror 8
programme.desc: Based on a true story, eight ordinary people of different backgrounds were selected as the first jury for a murder trial in South Korea in 2008.

programme.title: Ordinary People
programme.desc: When a high school gym teacher helps his student track down her missing friend, he finds himself faced with a conspiracy related to her disappearance.

programme.title: The Moon
programme.desc: An astronaut is left stranded in space because of an accident during a spaceflight. The former director of the space centre strives to bring him home safely...

programme.title: Deadman
programme.desc: An ace in the barge business makes money by selling his name, is falsely accused of embezzling billions. He fights to reclaim his stolen life from those tied to him solely by name.

programme.title: The Unfair
programme.desc: A protest against urban renewal leads to death of a cop and a teen. The boys father was arrested for the cops death. A young attorney is assigned to defend the father.

programme.title: Secret Zoo
programme.desc: Dreams of landing a permanent position at a top law firm, a lawyer takes on an unusual assignment of keeping an ownerless zoo running by convincing its employees to dress up as animals.

programme.title: Veteran
programme.desc: A merciless detective hunts down a young and successful drug addict who always escapes from investigations with the help of his wealth and connections.

programme.title: 200 Pounds Beauty
programme.desc: A timid, overweight and under-appreciated back-up singer resorts to drastic head-to-toe plastic surgery to become a pop diva.

programme.title: 0.0mhz
programme.desc: A group of thrill seekers try to prove the existence of ghost by using radio frequency technology inside the notorious haunted asylum.

programme.title: Concrete Utopia
programme.desc: Seoul has laid in ruin after an earthquake, leaving one single apartment remains standing. The apartments resident representative strives to protect residents from outsiders...

programme.title: 6/45: Lucky Lotto
programme.desc: The excitement of winning a lottery ticket doesnt last long for sergeant Chun-woo as it accidentally ends up crossing the Military Demarcation Line. He must get his act together and find it again!

programme.title: Unforgettable
programme.desc: A radio DJ receives a letter written 23 years ago in the past. Through the letter, the story of his first love and friendships of five friends are revealed.

programme.title: Cart
programme.desc: As a social critique, Cart tells a story of the employees of a retail supermarket band together when the contract workers are summarily laid off.

programme.title: Confession
programme.desc: A man who became a suspect in a closed-door murder seeks help from an attorney to prove him innocent. As they begin to piece the puzzle together, the truth slowly reverses.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E082
programme.desc: Clementina sorprende a Felipe besando a Antonieta. Florencia revela a Victoria que ella es la nueva duea de las tierras desde su casa hasta Los Samanes. Adelaida y Hansen se besan.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E083
programme.desc: Hilario advierte a Moncho que, para volver a ganarse su confianza, deber hacer todo lo que el le pida sin importar de que se trate. Florencia le pide a Nicols que se queden trabajando sus tierras para demostrarle a los Guanipa que no les temen y que, cuando el sienta que la ama, se casen por la iglesia. Ya en su casa, Hilario trata de explicarle a Victoria que se equivoca al pensar que Florencia es ms importante que ella para el, le ruega a Victoria que lo perdone; pero la muchacha, que est demasiado herida, se marcha de Cantarrana asegurando que ya no lo puede ver como su padre.Adelaida se complace al ver lo que se ha esmerado Hansen por preparar la velada para compartir con ella. Victoria le confiesa a Clementina lo mucho que le duele sentir que ya no puede estar orgullosa de ser la hija de Hilario Guanipa como siempre lo hizo.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E93
programme.desc: Marcelina, familiares y el juez se preocupan por la ausencia de Max. Astrid acusa a Camila de estar de acuerdo para hacerla pasar este mal rato. Llega el novio, bebido y ayudado por Ezequiel. Firman sus votos matrimoniales. A los meses, Astrid, estresada, pes desea un hijo para asegurar la fortuna. Ezequiel, sin resultados, queriendo enamorar a Camila.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E94
programme.desc: Anton se lleva secuestrado a Ezequiel y avisa a Fausto, para que tenga el placer de matarlo. Bajo engao citan a Amelia y Sebastin para hacer razonar a Fausto que liberen a Ezequiel, de lo contrario ella y su hijo por nacer, morirn.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E113
programme.desc: A seductive Pastora welcomes Amado, but then becomes aggressive; she wants to know how much he has paid the lawyer for betraying her.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E114
programme.desc: Pastora, in Illis room, analyzes in which flask to dilute an acid with which she intends to deform her twin.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E113
programme.desc: Gertrudis gives the news to Alfonso and Jose Pablo that they are already freeing Malena, who comes out at that moment and hugs her mother and thanks her for what she did. Alberto and Lorena meet in a cafe, he summoned her there because he needed to see her alone.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E89
programme.desc: Adriana acepta alejarse un poco de su enamorado mientras Azalea mejora; de pronto suena el timbre y es nada menos que Santiago Ibaez

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E90
programme.desc: Raiza se complace en ver la cara de sorpresa de Cesar, quien, al reaccionar, la toma del brazo con fuerza para sacarla del lugar.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E91
programme.desc: En un nuevo da; Salvatore advierte a Nacho que quiere que acabe con Adriana ese mismo da.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E083

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E084
programme.desc: Adelaida y Hansen hacen el amor por primera vez. Hilario quiere reconciliase con Adelaida para que ella lo ayude a recuperar el afecto de Victoria. Victoria le revela a Nicols que Florencia le hizo creer a Hilario que lo quera para obtener parte de las tierras de Cantarrana.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E94
programme.desc: Anton se lleva secuestrado a Ezequiel y avisa a Fausto, para que tenga el placer de matarlo. Bajo engao citan a Amelia y Sebastin para hacer razonar a Fausto que liberen a Ezequiel, de lo contrario ella y su hijo por nacer, morirn.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E95
programme.desc: Ezequiel y Fausto, enfrentados. Camila intenta convencer a Roger de que suelten a Ezequiel. La situacion se complica pes Amelia, detenida como rehen y acompaada por Sebastin, ya presenta dolores de parto.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E114
programme.desc: Pastora, in Illis room, analyzes in which flask to dilute an acid with which she intends to deform her twin.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E115
programme.desc: Pretending to be offended, Tamara loudly complains about having to sleep with Gabriel when she enters his room, Baron kisses her in order to shut her up.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E114
programme.desc: The housekeeper confronts Lorena to make her admit that she still loves Alberto and she evades by saying that she is Omars girlfriend. Then it is Lorena who confronts Norma to make her tell the truth about what she knows, and the latter, although terrified, ends up confessing that Gertrudis did murder Paco; but she cannot say anything because she has a death threat against her.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E115
programme.desc: Opening a drawer, Malena finds a picture frame with broken glass, with an old photo of her and Isabel. Alfonso arrives and discovers it, but Malena reacts with great annoyance towards him - Norma is about to leave the room, with the gun hidden inside a laundry basket, when she is surprised by the arrival of Gertrudis.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E96
programme.desc: Sebastin, esquivando los disparos de Anton, lleva a Amelia al hospital. All nace el bebe de ambos. Fausto se lleva nuevamente a Ezequiel como su rehen. Fausto y Patricia se emocionan al conocer a su nieto y Amelia le pide a su padre, que honre su palabra de dejar libre a Ezequiel.

programme.title: Dropped - S06:E08 - Bridge the Gap
programme.desc: Chris and Casey have hiked across New Zealand for weeks. Fighting for their lives has taken a toll on their emotions and abilities. They team up to hunt feral pigs, but the cache items used for survival create new challenges and deep frustrations.

programme.title: Wardens - S03:E01 - Operation Grizzly Bear
programme.desc: This week, wardens are tackling a situation involving a missing child that was reportedly pulled away by a bear... Luckily, its just a training drill. At the same time, shed antler hunting season kicks off, keeping the wardens busy!

programme.title: Alaskas Ultimate Bush Pilots - S01:E05 - Risky Business
programme.desc: Pilot Peter Rosendahl combats gail force wind and choppy seas while taxiing a group of hunters to a floating lodge.

programme.title: Close Quarter Battle - S01:E06 - Snipers and Scout
programme.desc: Joint Task Force Two (JTF 2) is the elite Canadian Forces Special Operations unit responsible for a broad range of missions, including counter-terrorism and armed assistance to other government departments. Highly secretive, JTF 2 and its predecessor, the Canadian Airborne Regiment, have been deployed in hotspots around the world from Haiti to Bosnia. This episode focuses on the legendary JTF sniper teams and their use in Afghanistan alongside the British SAS and the US Delta Force at "the sharp end of the spear." A book written by an ex-JTF member explains how, in 2006, both the Pentagon and the British Foreign Office noted the instrumental role that JTF 2 played in the rescue of the British and Canadian Christian Peacemaker Team held hostage in Iraq. Unique in look, the FN P90 personal defense weapon, used by JTF 2 soldiers and special police around the world, will be highlighted in this program.

programme.title: Carters W.A.R. - S02:E06 - On the Frontline
programme.desc: From rhino saviors and lion researchers, to savvy entrepreneurs and armed security teams, Ivan tours the front lines of conservation to meet the individuals who are reshaping and protecting wild Africa. What does it really mean to devote your life to the cause of conservation? Ivan journeys to four separate countries to find out what makes these unsung heroes tick.

programme.title: Royal Documentaries - S01:E12 - The New Royals
programme.desc: Princesses Beatrice and Eugenie have gone through a lot of media attention and tough situations in their lives. From their parents very public split to being targeted by the press, theyve been through quite a bit. Despite all this, they remain dedicated to supporting the monarchy with their charity work. Through serving the Commonwealth, both sisters continue to make a positive impact.

programme.title: Carters W.A.R. - S01:E08 - Secret Trade
programme.desc: Ivan Carter investigates Africas infamous poaching trade.

programme.title: Savage Wild - S04:E01 - Manny Goes Medieval
programme.desc: Manny demonstrates his medieval skills, taking a huge wild boar with Viking-style spears.

programme.title: Savage Wild - S04:E02 - Drought and Danger
programme.desc: Manny investigates how severe drought has caused wildlife to congregate near any water.

programme.title: Savage Wild - S04:E03 - Black Bear Explosion
programme.desc: Manny explores a Florida swamp swarming with black bears.

programme.title: Savage Wild - S04:E04 - Pitch Black
programme.desc: Manny explores a primitive river in pitch black darkness And encounters a monster.

programme.title: Man Eats Wild - S02:E01 - Man Eating Crocodiles of Zimbabwe
programme.desc: Mario takes a huge gamble by rafting along Africas most dangerous river, the Zambezi, heading towards Lake Reba. But he ends up face-to-face with some of the largest and most fearsome man-eating crocodiles around.

programme.title: Man Eats Wild - S02:E02 - Namibian Desert Oryx
programme.desc: Mario heard from some locals about a strange-looking creature deep in the Namibian desert. So, he decided to brave the sweltering heat in a hot air balloon to track down the oryx.

programme.title: Man Eats Wild - S02:E03 - Kalahari Bushmen
programme.desc: In the Kalahari desert, theres an old tribe living off the land. Mario spends a week working hard to gather food to share with them.

programme.title: Man Eats Wild - S02:E04 - Untouched Atolls
programme.desc: Just off the coast of Africa is a strip of 115 islands called the Seychelles. Mario educates his audience as to how to fish for reef species. Out of know where he even attempts to swim with a sailfish.

programme.title: Sasquatch Mountain Man - S02:E12 - Texas Hog

programme.title: Royal Documentaries - S01:E34 - Prince William And Prince Harry The Next Royal Generation
programme.desc: Prince William and Prince Harry, along with their friends, got as much media attention as todays pop stars, fashion icons, and movie celebs. This documentary explores how this affected their personal lives and friendships, showcasing how they managed their fame alongside their royal responsibilities.

programme.title: Dropped - S06:E09 - The LZ
programme.desc: Chris and Casey Keefer must push to reach the LZ with a failing raft. With only a few hours before extraction, will Mother Nature get the best of them before they can get to safety?

programme.title: Dropped - S06:E10 - After the Drop
programme.desc: Back from their punishing experience in the New Zealand wilderness brothers Chris and Casey Keefer sit down to discuss the ups, downs and pivotal moments from their recent adventure.

programme.title: Wardens - S03:E02 - Operation Water Rescue
programme.desc: In this episode, some wardens are handling early season fishermen about the gaming rules, and others are picking up skills for open water rescues.

programme.title: Alaskas Ultimate Bush Pilots - S01:E06 - Training Day
programme.desc: Island Air is the lifeline to many in Kodiak. Sometimes the violent weather prevents the planes from landing so Erik takes the day to teach Pete how to use the camera hatch for a little target practice.

programme.title: Close Quarter Battle - S01:E07 - S.W.A.T.
programme.desc: In 1968, a new form of military policing was being developed in a rural area north of Los Angeles. The Los Angeles Police Department sent an observer to this unit, and he, in turn, took this knowledge back to the LAPD. This contributed to the development of the departments first Special Weapons and Tactics (S.W.A.T.) team. This CQB episode takes an historical journey to examine how this incident affected and changed police tactics around the world. Using CQBs trademark "sub-second" analysis, the program also looks at how police S.W.A.T. teams train, plan and equip themselves for the challenges of urban combat. The dramatization of a 1980s S.W.A.T. siege of a gang safe-house demonstrates the complicated challenge of protecting innocent people who might be caught in the line of fi re, as well as the specifics of the squads training regimen, how they communicated, and the special equipment they used.

programme.title: Savage Wild - S05:E09 - Save a Watermelon Kill a Boar Part 2
programme.desc: After slaying a monster boar, Manny heads back into the forest and goes toe to toe with an even bigger boar.

programme.title: Savage Wild - S05:E10 - How to Stop a Charging Wild Boar
programme.desc: In this episode of Savage Wild, were headed into the palmettos with Full Rut Outfitters in search of wild boar.

programme.title: Carters W.A.R. - S02:E07 - Sold into Slavery
programme.desc: Ivan is investigating the illegal trade of bush meat in Kinshasa, when he stumbles upon three captive baby chimpanzees being sold on the black market. A dramatic rescue is planned that sees the chimps safely delivered to a place dedicated to providing a better future for all primates in Africa.

programme.title: Royal Documentaries - S01:E38 - HM The Queen A Remarkable Life
programme.desc: The most notable woman in modern times has to be our Late Queen, Elizabeth II. She ruled for 70 years, the longest reign in British history. Once a princess who wasnt supposed to be queen, Elizabeth II led the country to thrive after World War II and became a steady presence in our changing world. In a thousand years of British monarchy, Elizabeth II is likely one of the most outstanding monarchs ever.

programme.desc: Experience the excitement of the Monaco showdown, where high-speed hydrofoil racing was mixed with intense drama. The race weekend was full of action, featuring jaw-dropping crashes during qualifying and tactical battles in the elimination heats.

programme.title: FIBA World Basketball - S01:E44 - 27 August 2025
programme.desc: EuroBasket is starting, AmeriCup is kicking off, and AfroBasket is wrapping up.

programme.title: E1 Champions of the Water - S02:E02 - Doha
programme.desc: Behindthescenes access with both Team Rafa and Aoki Racingfrom strategy sessions to final adrenaline-fuelled showdown

programme.title: E1 - S02:E10 - Re-Live Monaco Race Off
programme.desc: Team Blue Rising dominates in Monacos challenging water course, setting the stage for crucial upcoming rounds in the series.

programme.title: E1 - S02:E06 - UIM E1-Weltmeisterschaft in Dubrovnik
programme.desc: Get ready for more heart-racing action as the UIM E1 World Championship took over Dubrovniks Adriatic Sea on June 1314, 2025. With the historic city walls and beautiful sights of the UNESCO Old Town, the famous RaceBird boats zoomed at 50 knots, making it an unforgettable event

programme.title: E1 Champions of the Water - S02:E06 - Monaco
programme.desc: Team Rafa, leading the championship, rolls into Monaco as the top contenders. However, the competition takes place right under the watchful eye of sporting great and team owner, Rafa Nadal. This isnt your typical weekendits a standout event in the chronicles of E1 racing.

programme.title: Silverstone Festival 2025 - S01:E01 - Episode 1
programme.desc: Relive the opening action from the final Silverstone Festival in style. From packed Formula Junior grids to thundering Group C prototypes and stunning GT classics, Part One delivers wheel-to-wheel racing and golden moments on Britains most famous circuit. A celebration of 75 years of Formula 1 and legendary machines sets the tone for an unforgettable weekend.

programme.title: Sport Confidential - S05:E42 - FIFA-Weltmeisterschaft 2026
programme.desc: The FIFA World Cup is coming to North America in 2026.

programme.title: Racing on the Edge - S02:E08 - Fletchers Return
programme.desc: From competing at the sidelines of the 49er World Championships to working behind the scenes in hospitality, Fletchers journey is a story of resilience and humility. He fights to reclaim his position at the top of the SailGP circuit and re-emerges as driver of Emirates GBR.

programme.title: Racing On The Edge - S02:E09 - International "Penalty Point"
programme.desc: Dealing with a never-before-seen penalty points situation and some chaos within, Team Germany is determined to show what theyre made of on their own turf. They learn that winning is just as much about the adventure as it is about crossing the finish line first.

programme.title: Racing on the Edge - S02:E07
programme.desc: With the SailGP season reaching its halfway mark, the pressure to deliver consistent results mounts for every team. In this episode, cameras follow Tom Slingsbys Australia SailGP Team as they try to maintain their championship lead while rivals sharpen their tactics.
